name: APT12 (G0005)
description: Enterprise techniques used by APT12, ATT&CK group G0005 v2.0

techniques.comment: APT12 has exploited multiple vulnerabilities for execution, including Microsoft Office vulnerabilities (CVE-2009-3129, CVE-2012-0158) and vulnerabilities in Adobe Reader and Flash (CVE-2009-4324, CVE-2009-0927, CVE-2011-0609, CVE-2011-0611).[2][3]
APT12 has sent emails with malicious Microsoft Office documents and PDFs attached.[2][3]
APT12 has attempted to get victims to open malicious Microsoft Word and PDF attachment sent via spearphishing.[2][3]
APT12 has used blogs and WordPress for C2 infrastructure.[1]
APT12 has used blogs and WordPress for C2 infrastructure.[1]
